amendment.description: Amendment allocates $100,000 for the Architect of the Capitol to conduct a feasibility study regarding the installation and operation of Capital Bikeshare stations on Capitol Grounds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in House Report 114-611 to require the Architect of the Capitol to conduct a feasibility study regarding the installation and operation of Capital Bikeshare stations on Capitol Grounds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
